comment.author: 43742638@N04
comment._content: Should this not be titled St Patrick Square? as it looks on to Buccleuch Place through the archway and the building itself is on Buccleuch St

comment.author: 40579445@N02
comment._content: Or indeed Buccleuch Pend as it appears to refer to the houses above it.Source the OS 1893 Town Plan.
